identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.core_philosophy: Content is King. Typography is the Interface. Orange is the Alert.

scale.h1: text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase leading-none
scale.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-zinc-500

typography.rules: Headings must be UPPERCASE and condensed (Oswald). Body text must be highly readable (Manrope). No generic Inter.

buttons.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-bold ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 h-11 px-8
buttons.primary: bg-[#FF6600] text-white hover:bg-[#E55B00] rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider
buttons.secondary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-zinc-800 rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider

inputs.base: flex h-12 w-full rounded-none border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-base shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-[#FF6600] disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.news_item: group flex flex-col gap-4 border-b border-black/10 pb-8 hover:opacity-80 transition-opacity cursor-pointer

implementation_steps.description: Update global CSS with base styles and font imports
Create reusable UI components (Button, Input, Card) using the design system rules

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients. Stick to flat, bold colors.
Use uppercase Oswald for all headings.
Buttons must be square (rounded-none) for that 'brutalist/news' feel.
All interactive elements must have a distinct hover state (color change or underline).
Images should have sharp edges (no border-radius) or very minimal (rounded-sm).
Use 'lucide-react' for icons: generic newspaper/edit/user icons.
